title: Welcome to Continuous Reporting! Introduce Yourself
body: This is a forum to discuss topics related to FedRAMP Continuous Reporting Community Working Group. If you're so inclined, please introduce yourself in the comments section so we can welcome you into the community!
author: sam-aydlette

comments.body: Sam Aydlette here, FedRAMP Program Manager for Continuous Monitoring and Vulnerability Management here at GSA 👋 . Looking forward to meeting everyone and discussing this important topic.
comments.author: sam-aydlette

replies.body: I realize way back when I never introduced myself and will do it here so it is easy to find for the newcomers. Hi, I'm AJ and I'm one of the facilitators of this community working group and a data scientist here in FedRAMP. You can find out more about me on [my GitHub profile](https://github.com/aj-stein-gsa) if you want more detail. I look forward to learning more from all of you!
replies.author: aj-stein-gsa

comments.body:
Hi Team!

My name is Chris Johnson, and I'm currently the Chief Services Officer for CoSo Cloud. I have been working with FedRamp for a little more than 10 years. I've personally developed software that reports inventory and POAM requirements for the FedRamp program, and I'm currently working on new solutions where I intend to help bring the FedRamp 20x roadmap to fruition. 

I'm very excited that we are all collaborating through Git. I'm hopeful for what the future will bring as we help enhance the current process. :)
comments.author: chrisjohnson1

comments.body: Good morning.  I'm Warner Sterling and I'm the CISO for our AIP for Government cloud service offering.
comments.author: wsterling

comments.body: Nice to meet all of you. I'm Bryan Kaplan and I am the CIO/CISO for Juvare, LLC who is FedRAMP High authorized for our Juvare Federal Cloud product.
comments.author: juvarebkaplan

comments.body: Hi everyone - Alex Nette from [Hive Systems](www.hivesystems.com) here. Looking forward to contributing to the future of FedRAMP!

comments.body: Hello All - Irfan Nawaz from Salesforce! #FedRAMP20x

comments.body: Hello everyone. I am the Enterprise Security Cloud Lead at the Department of Education. I have been working with FedRAMP for the last 10+ years. Prior to my current role I have worked at CSPs, 3PAOs and as cloud support for a number of departments.

comments.body: Hello all! I am Drew Wilmoth, FedRAMP Security Compliance Engineer at Gitlab 👋
comments.author: awilmo8

comments.body: Larry Hughes (VP of R&D) from Cloud Security Alliance (CSA) here. CSA works with some 15,000 global volunteers to define and raise awareness of best practices for cloud security. We believe that our STAR program (Security Trust Assurance and Risk) and Cloud Controls Matrix (CCM), which have played an proven role in the cloud security ecosystem since 2013, can play an important role in FedRAMP 20x.
comments.author: csa-lhughes

comments.body:
